frontmatter.title: Implementing Image Convolutions in Python
frontmatter.excerpt: Ever wondered how blurs and edge detections work on images, it's much simple than you expect. In this writing, I will implement a convolution algorithm and use it to blur and edge detect on images.

frontmatter.title: Binary Search Tree in C++
frontmatter.excerpt: Binary Search Trees are very interesting data structures. It's a tree where each node of the tree has up to 2 nodes, left and right. What makes a binary tree a binary 'search' tree is how the left and right nodes are added.

frontmatter.title: Using Events and Delegates in Unity
frontmatter.excerpt: Events and Delegates allow you notify other classes when a certain action happens. This writing will try to explain what events and delegates are and how to use them.

frontmatter.title: Virtual Memory
frontmatter.excerpt: All modern OS have virtual memory implemented. I came across virtual memory when I was worried something was wrong with my RAM and I found it to be interesting. It gives a program the illusion of continuous and infinite memory.
